title: Fighting in Sudan rages on for second day
description: The fighting over a power struggle goes on between the army and the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces.

title: Putin meets with China’s defence minister in Moscow
description: Putin met with Gen. Li Shangfu less than a month after Chinese leader Xi Jinping held a three-day state visit to Moscow.

title: Iran issues prison sentences for 2020 downing of Ukraine airliner
description: Iran has said the suspects include missile defence personnel who made a 'disastrous mistake'.

title: Is Sudan’s unity in danger?
description: The Sudanese army is battling the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces.

title: Photos: Phantom of the Opera ends 35-year Broadway run
description: The longest-running stage musical in Broadway history is taking its final bow in New York City.

title: The Ciudad Juárez fire – and other circles of made-in-USA hell
description: The US is just as responsible for the deaths of 40 asylum seekers as those who decided to let them burn to death.

title: Dozens of defence forces killed in Burkina Faso attack: Governor
description: Provisional death toll was 34 volunteers and six soldiers in an attack carried out by unidentified men, authorities say.

title: Who is al-Burhan, Sudan’s military de facto head of state?
description: General Abdel Fattah al-Burhan is the military commander who has for years been the de facto leader of Sudan.

title: Yemen rebels and government complete prisoner exchange
description: Scores of prisoners have been freed on the last of a three-day exchange of nearly 900 detainees.

title: Despite Israeli restrictions, Christians celebrate Holy Flame
description: Palestinian Christians say they face harsh Israeli restrictions that prevent them from celebrating their faith.

title: ‘An Easter exchange’: 130 Ukrainian prisoners of war freed
description: Ukrainian official confirms exchange of POWs on the day Orthodox Christians in Ukraine and Russia celebrate Easter.

title: Egyptian soldiers captured in Sudan to be returned, says RSF
description: The RSF, now embroiled in deadly conflict with the country’s army, released a video showing Egyptian troops in custudy.

title: Sudan unrest: What are the Rapid Support Forces?
description: The RSF evolved from so-called Janjaweed militias that fought in a conflict in the 2000s in the Darfur region.

title: Fighting in Sudan: What we know so far
description: Fighting between the army and a paramilitary force rages for a second day as the international community calls for calm.

title: Video shows US police at wrong house before shooting homeowner
description: Robert Dotson, 52, was killed after officers responding to a domestic violence report went to the wrong house.

title: Who is ‘Hemedti’, general behind Sudan’s feared RSF force?
description: Mohamed Hamdan Dagalo has risen through the ranks to become one of the most powerful and richest men in Sudan.

title: Ex-MP Atiq Ahmed, brother shot dead on live TV in India
description: Former lawmaker convicted of kidnapping was shot dead with his brother in an attack in Uttar Pradesh state.

title: The long shadow of Saddam’s dictatorship in Iraq
description: The political elite continues to use Saddam Hussein's repressive tactics in dealing with dissent and opposition.

title: The deadly word, freedom: Brian Eno and Ha-Joon Chang
description: Musical innovator and economist talk about the dangers of accepting status quo and creative tools for a fairer society.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 417
description: As the conflict enters its 417th day, we take a look at the main developments.

title: Christians celebrate Holy Fire ritual under Israeli restrictions
description: Pilgrims travel to the Church of the Holy Sepulchre in Old City of Jerusalem to celebrate what they call a miracle.

title: Zhang eyes heavyweight title fight after shock win over Joyce
description: Victory by China's 'Big Bang' Zhang makes him the WBO's mandatory challenger to Ukraine's Oleksandr Usyk.

title: Fire in Dubai apartment building kills 16 people: Local media
description: Investigation launched, but authorities say violations of safety and security regulations the cause.

title: Sudan death toll rises to 56 as fierce fighting rages in Khartoum
description: Doctors say hundreds of people also wounded as battles between army and paramilitary force stretch into second day.

title: S Korea fires warning shots after N Korean boat incursion
description: Seoul says it fired warning shots to expel a North Korean vessel that crossed a disputed maritime border.

title: Ukraine reports ‘unprecedented bloody battles’ in Bakhmut
description: Kyiv says its forces are continuing to hold on to Bakhmut as Russia claims advances in the embattled eastern city.

title: Hong Kong Bishop heads to mainland China amid Vatican strains
description: Stephen Chow's visit comes as China's Beijing-approved Catholic Church makes appointments in defiance of Vatican deal.
